name: Game Over (itch) (beatallitas)
description:
Inspired in spanish All Saints' Day, you have died. Your family puts candles on your grave so you can follow them to reach afterlife. However, some spirits will try to steal your soul, you need to throw them your candles to destroy them. But be careful, because if you lose all your candles, you wouldn't be able to cross to the afterlife. 

Controls:

W, A, S, D -> Move

Left click -> Shoot
